titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the John Henry Doughty papers.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Native of Litchfield County, Conn., John H. Doughty was 1863 University of Michigan Medical School graduate and Civil War Veteran.
archdesc.scopecontent: Scanned PDF image of Doughty's autobiographical letter addressed to F. E. Coon, Editor of Michiganensian (spelled in letter Michigansion), describing his time in Ann Arbor, Mich. and as Assistant Surgeon, U.S. Volunteers. Transcript of the letter includes a note by Heather Mullett, Doughty's great-granddaughter and University of Michigan Law School graduate (1963), dated 1963. Also a JPG image of photo of Doughty in uniform with his wife Elizabeth.
